tonegod.gui.framework.animation

Class TemporalAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • tonegod.gui.framework.animation.TemporalAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmitterEmitAction, EmitterEnableAction, EmitterInfluencerAction, ExecuteAction, HideAction, MoveByAction, MoveTexByAction, MoveTexToAction, MoveToAction, RotateByAction, ScaleByAction, SetRegionAction, ShowAction, SplineAction

    public abstract class TemporalAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Based on LibGdx TemporalAction. This has been altered to work with QuadData representing a single quad from a mesh of x number of quads.
